content:
What is the Rule of Common Sense?
The Rule of Common Sense is an umbrella term that classifies anything that is not listed but still gives an unfair advantage over other players (OOC-wise). This is to be solely decided by the admin team and/or the admin that takes disciplinary action on the player, at the time.
Penalty for breaking this rule.
Penalties for this rule can vary from being kicked, being muted, warned and in some cases, can lead to a temporary ban.
